definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc

sentences.english: Lie on your back with your legs spread or raise your knees to your head.
sentences.chinese: 平躺，張開雙腿或者把膝蓋擡到靠近頭部的地方。

sentences.english: Engage your core muscles, then curl your upper body towards a sitting position.
sentences.chinese: 調動人體核心部位的肌肉力量向上擡體，成坐姿。

sentences.english: Joshua therefore commanded the priests, saying, Come ye up out of Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 你吩咐擡法櫃的祭司從約旦河裏上來。

sentences.english: The coffin was carried by six soldiers walking in lockstep .
sentences.chinese: 靈柩由齊步行進的六名士兵擡着。

sentences.english: Finally, the ref physically threw him out of the building.
sentences.chinese: 最後，裁判把他擡出了體育館。

sentences.english: I brought out some fruit but nobody wanted them.
sentences.chinese: 我擡出一些水果來，但是沒有人想要。

sentences.english: We will try and carry him on board the tartan .
sentences.chinese: 我們設法來把他擡到船上去吧。

sentences.english: The machine gun hailed over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 機關槍的火力壓得我們擡不起頭來。

sentences.english: Keep the horse's head up and still to make your farrier's work easier.
sentences.chinese: 讓馬擡着頭並且靜止能使蹄鐵匠的工作更加容易。

sentences.english: Thou to whom I dare not lift mine eyes, wilt Thou yet pardon me?
sentences.chinese: 啊，我不敢擡眼仰望的天神啊，你還肯再饒恕我吧。

sentences.english: Kim was carried out of the ring by stretcher and rushed to Desert Springs Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，金被擔架擡出拳擊臺，送往沙漠甘泉醫院。

sentences.english: Small diameter pipes of this project are suitable for manual transportation.
sentences.chinese: 本工程都是小口徑管適合用人力擡管布管。

sentences.english: The living helped to carry the dead and wounded to special station.
sentences.chinese: 活着的人幫助把傷亡人員擡到專門的急救站。

sentences.english: The neck should be raised and arched, the nose line vertical.
sentences.chinese: 馬匹頸部高擡弓彎，頭部的鼻線垂直。

sentences.english: Lift him on the horse, Scarlett, and face his head toward its tail.
sentences.chinese: 史考烈特，將他擡上馬，頭面對着尾巴。

sentences.english: The poles are to be inserted into the rings so they will be on two sides of the altar when it is carried.
sentences.chinese: 這貢要穿在壇兩旁的環子內，用以擡壇。

definition: to bow the head/to yield/to give in
nutation (plants turning to face the sun)
to turn one's head/to change direction/U-turn/volte face/to repent
to overdo it/to overstep the limit/excessively/above one's head/overhead
to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
to raise one's head/to gain ground/account name, or space for writing the name on checks, bills etc
